channel.title: Anatomy on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in Anatomy on Cortically Magnified

item.title: The lens
item.description: The lens is the component in the eye that reflects light. They are not always shape liked pancakes or magnifying glasses. In small mammals, the lens is very often looks like the chewy tapioca balls in Asian boba milk tea. Primate lenses are more like magnifying glasses:
